EmailTemplate.name: Online Payment Info
EmailTemplate.subject: DipUKMP Fee Payment Information
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Student_Programme__c.Student__c},
Student ID Number: {!Contact.LSTM_No__c} Course: {!Student_Programme__c.Programme__c}
LSTM have partnered with Flywire to provide you with an easy and secure method of sending fee payments in your home currency. You can pay by bank transfer, debit/credit card and e-wallet methods.
The fee for this course is {!Student_Programme__c.Invoice_Amount__c}.
How to pay:
1. Visit www.flywire.com/pay/lstmed and choose your country 2. Input the amount you are paying in GBP
Payment by bank transfer or international debit/credit card = {!Student_Programme__c.Invoice_Amount__c} Payment by domestic UK credit/debit cards in GBP = {!Student_Programme__c.UK_Card_Payment_Fee__c} (incl. 2% fee)
3. Choose your payment method and make your payment to Flywire 4. Enter your details and if you are paying on behalf of a student, the details of the student you are paying for 5. Track and confirm your payment by email, SMS, or by logging into www.flywire.com/pay/lstmed
Yours sincerely
Liverpool School of Tropical Medicine Pembroke Place Liverpool L3 5QA United Kingdom
